name: Flaunch Hooklist
description: Flaunch hooks for token launching on Base

8453.name: ETH-flETH Auto Wrap Hook on Base
8453.description: Automatic wrapping functionality for ETH and Flaunch ETH (flETH) tokens on Base

8453.name: Flaunch Hook on Base
8453.description: Flaunch memecoin launchpad liquidity management. Traditional position manager which supports internal buy position to support token buybacks automatically created from fees, internal Swap Pool to ensure that all fees are paid in ETH, rather than the token, and dynamic fee distribution across stakeholders
